description.narrative: With the funds, Coordinadora Ambiental Valles en Movimiento Comuna de Monte Patria (Community of Monte Patria, Valleys in Movement Environmental Coordinator VEM) will develop a radio station in the Monte Patria community to provide information to the public about environmental issues, particularly around water. Community livelihoods depend greatly on agriculture and livestock, as well as emerging tourism industry; however, the regions is experiencing a water crisis that has been so severe, farmers have had to reduce their farm acreage and provisions for human consumption is threatened in some areas. This is the result of the indiscriminate expansion of the monoculture agriculture industry and the imminent installation of mining projects along the headwaters of three of the five rivers that shape the topography of the area. The group aims to increase public awareness and knowledge around the issue. It will cover the costs of locating a physical location for the radio station, installing a transmitting antenna, and obtaining the necessary equipment and permits to run it.
